welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.content:
GCommands

--- ## üìÇ | Installation ```sh npm install gcommands yarn add gcommands # Dev Build npm install gcommands@dev yarn add gcommands@dev ``` ## üê¢ | Guide & Documentation To help you learn more with GCommands we have a [guide](https://gcommands.js.org/guide/) and [documentation](https://gcommands.js.org/docs/) for you. If you are still having trouble, you can join our [Garlic Team](https://discord.gg/AjKJSBbGm2) discord server. ## üëÄ | Features - Command Handler, Event Handler - Supports slash, legacy and context menus commands - Supports custom i18n messages - Supports discord.js v12 and v13 - Simply have a legacy and slash command in 1 file - Supports many types of arguments

classes.name: ButtonCollector
classes.description:
Collects buttons on a message.
Will automatically stop if the channel (`'channelDelete'`), guild (`'guildDelete'`) or message (`'messageDelete'`) are deleted.

params.name: options
params.description: The options to be applied to this collector

methods.name: collect
methods.description: Handles a button for possible collection.

methods.name: endReason
methods.description: The reason this collector has ended with, or null if it hasn't ended yet

methods.name: _handleMessageDeletion
methods.description: Handles checking if the message has been deleted, and if so, stops the collector with the reason 'messageDelete'.

methods.name: _handleChannelDeletion
methods.description: Handles checking if the channel has been deleted, and if so, stops the collector with the reason 'channelDelete'.

methods.name: _handleGuildDeletion
methods.description: Handles checking if the guild has been deleted, and if so, stops the collector with the reason 'guildDelete'.

methods.name: key
methods.description: Gets the collector key for a button.

params.name: button
params.description: The button to get the key for

classes.name: InteractionCollector
classes.description:
Collects buttons on a message.
Will automatically stop if the channel (`'channelDelete'`), guild (`'guildDelete'`) or message (`'messageDelete'`) are deleted.

params.name: options
params.description: The options to be applied to this collector

props.name: messageId
props.description: The message from which to collect interactions, if provided

props.name: channelId
props.description: The channel from which to collect interactions, if provided

props.name: guildId
props.description: The guild from which to collect interactions, if provided

props.name: interactionType
props.description: The the type of interaction to collect

props.name: componentType
props.description: The the type of component to collect

methods.name: collect
methods.description: Handles a button for possible collection.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Handles an interaction for possible disposal.

params.name: interaction
params.description: The interaction that could be disposed of

methods.name: endReason
methods.description: The reason this collector has ended with, or null if it hasn't ended yet

methods.name: _handleMessageDeletion
methods.description: Handles checking if the message has been deleted, and if so, stops the collector with the reason 'messageDelete'.

methods.name: _handleChannelDeletion
methods.description: Handles checking if the channel has been deleted, and if so, stops the collector with the reason 'channelDelete'.

methods.name: _handleGuildDeletion
methods.description: Handles checking if the guild has been deleted, and if so, stops the collector with the reason 'guildDelete'.

events.name: collect
events.description: Emitted whenever an interaction is collected.

events.name: dispose
events.description: Emitted whenever an interaction is disposed of.

params.name: interaction
params.description: The interaction that was disposed of

classes.name: SelectMenuCollector
classes.description:
Collects menus on a message.
Will automatically stop if the channel (`'channelDelete'`), guild (`'guildDelete'`) or message (`'messageDelete'`) are deleted.

params.name: options
params.description: The options to be applied to this collector

methods.name: collect
methods.description: Handles a menu for possible collection.

methods.name: endReason
methods.description: The reason this collector has ended with, or null if it hasn't ended yet

methods.name: _handleMessageDeletion
methods.description: Handles checking if the message has been deleted, and if so, stops the collector with the reason 'messageDelete'.

methods.name: _handleChannelDeletion
methods.description: Handles checking if the channel has been deleted, and if so, stops the collector with the reason 'channelDelete'.

methods.name: _handleGuildDeletion
methods.description: Handles checking if the guild has been deleted, and if so, stops the collector with the reason 'guildDelete'.

methods.name: key
methods.description: Gets the collector key for a menu.

params.name: menu
params.description: The menu to get the key for

typedefs.name: GCommandsOptionsLanguage
typedefs.description:
The GCommandsOptionsLanguage
* english
* spanish
* portuguese
* russian
* german
* czech
* slovak
* turkish
* polish
* indonesian
* italian

typedefs.name: GCommandsOptionsCommandsContext
typedefs.description:
The GCommandsOptionsCommandsContext
* both
* user
* message
* false

typedefs.name: Inhibitor
typedefs.description: The Inhibitor You can see guide to get a better idea of how inhibitors work.

typedefs.name: CommandOptions
typedefs.description:
The CommandOptions
<info>`channelThreadOnly` is only for d.js v13</info>

typedefs.name: ArgumentType
typedefs.description:
ArgumentType
* SUB_COMMAND
* SUB_COMMAND_GROUP
* STRING
* INTEGER
* BOOLEAN
* USER
* CHANNEL
* ROLE
* MENTIONABLE
* NUMBER

typedefs.name: ApplicationCommandType
typedefs.description:
The type of an {@link ApplicationCommand} object:
* CHAT_INPUT
* USER
* MESSAGE

typedefs.name: GInteractionType
typedefs.description:
The type of an {@link GInteraction} object:
* PING
* APPLICATION_COMMAND
* MESSAGE_COMPONENT

typedefs.name: MessageComponentType
typedefs.description:
The type of a message component
* ACTION_ROW
* BUTTON
* SELECT_MENU
